name: You are the hacker! (3.0 update out now)
name_original: You are the hacker! (3.0 update out now)
description:
You are the hacker is a hacking game about simply just hack different places by guessing their password. You get a hint to every password like "kcae" witch can give the word cake.

The game is filled with easter eggs for example type "my history" and you will get a unexpected message. Their is more easter eggs than that so go find em'.   enjoy!
